# Issue Template

**Note:** This project is fully owned by Rajantha R Ambegala. Issues are managed at the owner's discretion.

## Bug Report
For bug reports, please include:
- Description of the bug
- Steps to reproduce
- Expected behavior
- Actual behavior
- Environment (OS, browser, version)
- Screenshots if applicable

## Feature Request
For feature requests, please include:
- Description of the feature
- Use case/motivation
- Any implementation suggestions

## Question
For questions or support requests, please contact:
- Email: rajantha.rc@gmail.com
- GitHub: [@RajanthaR](https://github.com/RajanthaR/)

---

Thank you for your interest in this project!
